title: Charm of Nature
desc:
Post 2236
- This effect activates when someone (other than yourself) tries to make you draw one or more cards:
 - If they used a <:green:1106234108042031166>, or <:blue:1106234079055200378> card, you don't draw anything.
 - If they used a <:red:1106234051129507932> or <:yellow:1106234135384699023> card, you draw double the amount of cards you would have otherwise and discard this card.
 - If their card counts as both or none of the above, this card does nothing to it.
